name: NewSpace Flight Simulator - Indie Galactic Space Jam
name_original: NewSpace Flight Simulator - Indie Galactic Space Jam
description:
Welcome to New Space Flight Simulator. Inspired by the Rocket Crafters Sidereus SAS product challenge at the first annual Indie Galactic Game Jam in Orlando Florida!
http://rocketcrafters.com/
http://indiegalacticspacejam.com/
http://dmtsource.com/

Controls
  • Pitch Up/Down = W,S
  • Roll Left/Right = A,D
  • Rudder Left/Right = Q,E
  • Throttle Down/Up = 1,2
  • Brake = b
  • gear = g

Game Features:
-Massive planet to exlore
-Altitude dependent gravity, drag,
-Gravity as a Central Force
-Delta wing Space Access System.

Game By:
Derek M Tishler, DMTSource.com

Vehicles By:
Anthony Bagsby

Music By:
Raphael Polk
